resources.string: App provides design patterns require to be introduced in application when developing for Elderly People
App with introduction makes it easier to understand how to use this App.
Placing information in the center helps older people to access it easily without getting distracted with other content
Clicking on fields below will pop up the right keyboard depending on the field.
Require Content placed in center of the screen.
Hit the button to launch the application tutorial
